newsitem.title: USA: Ag-Bag International Q1 shr loss.
newsitem.headline: Ag-Bag International Q1 shr loss.

text.p: Ag-Bag International Ltd Wednesday reported a net loss for the quarter ending March 31, 1997 of $378,477, $0.03 a share compared to a loss of $112,488 or $0.01 a share in the first quarter of 1996.
Consolidated net sales for the three-month period ended March 31, 1997 were $2,842,594, down 28.47 percent.

"At this point, our sales are strong, but deliveries were delayed because the bag folding facility was not completely operational and due to the long and harsh winter in the upper Midwest," said Larry Inman, president and chief executive officer said. "However, the company expects that the next quarter will absorb these delayed sales and we expect a strong second quarter."
